param.name: includeExpression
param.para: A lambda expression representing the property(s) to be included in the 'include' clause (blog => blog.Url).
If multiple properties are to be included then specify an anonymous type including the properties (post => new { post.Title, post.BlogId }).

Docs.summary: Configures index include properties when targeting SQL Server.
Docs.returns: A builder to further configure the index.
Docs.remarks: To be added.
